alert.note: Alert for Ionia; Kent; Muskegon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 7:46PM EST until February 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Muskegon, Kent and Ionia counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle or light freezing rain is expected to develop between 10 pm and midnight over the northeast quarter of Muskegon County, the northern half of Kent County and the northern one third of Ionia County. Ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch are possible by morning. Temperatures are expected to rise above freezing by 7 am across these areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
